p: There are many ways that can used to improve the microbial flora during the ensiling process of alfalfa. In addition the carbohydrate resources [ 1] are used to increase the carbohydrate level through various inoculants or antimicrobial additives [ 20]. In recent years, consumer organizations suggest the use of natural products instead of chemical additives at livestock enterprises to improve feed quality and safety. Although physical scoring was above the findings of Çiftçi et al [ 1], and the Flieg’s score was lower than that of Çiftçi et al [ 1].
